abstract: Digging into David Einhorn's 110-page investor presentation on Green Mountain Coffee Roasters, which he entitled "GAAP-uccino."
snippet: Digging into David Einhorn's 110-page investor presentation on Green Mountain Coffee Roasters, which he entitled "GAAP-uccino."
lead_paragraph: Earlier this week DealBook reported on the fierce debate surrounding Green Mountain Coffee Roasters, one of America's hottest businesses. Is it the leader in the single-serve coffee-drinking revolution? Or is it an overvalued, overhyped company whose Keurig roasting system is a passing fad?

headline.main: Bulls and Bears Battle Over Green Mountain Coffee
